thread.title: Kylie Minogue is releasing a Christmas album featuring Dannii, James Corden, Iggy Pop and Frank Sinatra - Music
thread.title_full: Kylie Minogue is releasing a Christmas album featuring Dannii, James Corden, Iggy Pop and Frank Sinatra - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Christian Tobin
title: Kylie Minogue is releasing a Christmas album featuring Dannii, James Corden, Iggy Pop and Frank Sinatra - Music
text: Kylie Minogue will be spreading some festive cheer this year with a brand new Christmas album and London gig.Kylie Christmas features collaborations with James Corden and Iggy Pop, and a posthumous appearance from Frank Sinatra, while the deluxe version includes a special duet with sister Dannii Minogue.The standard version of the album includes three brand new songs called 'White December', 'Christmas Isn't Christmas 'Til You Get Here' and 'Every Day's Like Christmas', the latter of which was written by Coldplay's Chris Martin.The deluxe edition features three further new songs, including the special Dannii team-up '100 Degrees'.A DVD featuring footage of Kylie in the studio and six of the album's tracks will be released alongside the record. © Rex Features / PJP photos The Aussie popstar has also announced a one-off festive show at London's Royal Albert Hall on December 11, marking the first time the singer has headlined the venue."To perform at the Royal Albert Hall will be a dream come true," Kylie said. "I can't wait for December 11 to share a night of joy and celebration with everyone."Tickets for the special concert go on sale at 11am today (October 2) from the Royal Albert Hall website. © facebook.com/thexfactoraustralia The full tracklisting for Kylie Christmas is as follows:Standard1. It's the Most Wonderful Time of the Year2. Santa Claus Is Coming to Town featuring Frank Sinatra3. Winter Wonderland4. Christmas Wrapping (With Iggy Pop)5. Only You (With James Corden)6. I'm Gonna Be Warm This Winter7. Every Day's Like Christmas8. Let It Snow9. White December10. 2000 Miles11. Santa Baby12. Christmas Isn't Christmas 'Til You Get Here13. Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas Deluxe14. Oh Santa15. 100 Degrees (With Dannii Minogue)16. Cried Out ChristmasKylie Christmas will be released on November 13 via Parlophone, with a vinyl release following on November 27.
